segments.text: It's not that far . Do you see that Yellow building over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The big one or the small one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's right next to it , on the right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know if there's a convenience store around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think there's one around here . The closest one is on 3rd street , but that's probably closed now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really need to get some things before I leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you could go down to 22nd street . There are lot of stores down there that are open 24 hours a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I take the subway to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but that'll probably take about half an hour . You should just take a cab .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , from here I think it's only about 5 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
